text: Neil Fingleton (18 December 1980 – 25 February 2017) was an English actor and basketball player. He was the tallest British-born man and the tallest man in the European Union at 7 ft 7.56 in (232.6 cm) in height and among the 25 tallest men in the world. This title has been confirmed by the Guinness Book of Records in the summer of 2007; Fingleton took over from Christopher Greener who stood at 7 ft 6 ¼ in (229.2 cm) in height. Fingleton died on 25 February 2017 from a heart attack in Durham, England, aged 36. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from County Durham Category:British basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:English movie actors Category:Sportspeople from County Durham
title: Neil Fingleton
